All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
The App class serves as the entry point for the application.
Controller
The Controller class is responsible for managing the interactions between the view and the services.
IControllerForServiceController
Interface including controller service controller methods
IControllerForServiceThymio
Interface including Thymio service controller methods
IControllerForView
Interface including View controller methods
IServiceControllerForController
Interface including controller controller service methods
IServiceThymioForController
Interface including controller Thymio service methods
IViewForController
Interface including controller view methods
ServiceController
The ServiceController class handles the interaction with an Xbox controller.
ServiceThymio
The ServiceThymio class manages the connection and interaction with a Thymio robot.
View
FXML Controller class The View class is responsible for handling the user interface of the application.
